dataIdInfo.idPurp: Hiesinger (2011) shapefile of Nearside Mare Basalt Ages
dataIdInfo.idAbs:
Map of nearside mare basalt units and their ages based on crater size-frequency distributions from counting efforts by Hiesinger, et. al (2011). For the regions used for crater counting, refer to the Hiesinger2011_Mare_Crater_Count_Areas shapefile. For more information, refer to: Hiesinger, H., J. W. Head, U. Wolf, R. Jaumann, and G. Neukum. "Ages and stratigraphy of lunar mare basalts: A synthesis." Geological Society of America Special Papers 477 (2011): 1-51. http://dx.doi.org/10.1130/2011.2477(01)

Units are named according to a simple letter/number designation. The letter indicates the basin and the number indicates the unit within the basin. Lower numbers reflect older units and higher numbers indicate younger units.

Letters:

  • A - Australe

  • H - Humorum

  • Hu - Humboldtianum

  • I - Imbrium

  • S - Serenitatis

  • T - Tranquillitatis

  • P - Oceanus Procellarum

  • N - Mare Nubium

  • C - Mare Cognitum

  • IN - Mare Insularum

  • F - Mare Frigoris

  • V - Mare Vaporum

  • Ma - Mare Marginis

  • Sy - Mare Smythii

  • SM - Sinus Medii

  • LT - Lacus Temporis

  • LA - Lacus Aestatis

  • PP - Palus Putredinis

  • CGr - Grimaldi

  • CCr - Cr√ºger

  • CRo - Rocca A

  • CSc - Schickard

  • CHu - Hubble

  • CJo - Joliot

  • CGo - Goddard
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Hiesinger, H., J. W. Head, U. Wolf, R. Jaumann, and G. Neukum. "Ages and stratigraphy of lunar mare basalts: A synthesis." Geological Society of America Special Papers 477 (2011): 1-51. http://dx.doi.org/10.1130/2011.2477(01)
